nodes.text: Madam Prisaal was a female individual from the planet Ichtor 8. When her husband was killed by pirates, she vowed to take revenge. After pursuing the pirates through twelve sectors and nearly killing them three separate times, she finally tracked them down on Tatooine. After she found their hideout, she hired freelance soldiers to eliminate the murderers.

"Madam Prisaal of Ichtor 8" is mentioned in the mission "Avenge My Murdered Husband" in Star Wars Galaxies, that is available at mission terminals on Tatooine. Prisaal hires the player to kill her husband's murderers. To accomplish this mission, the player has to destroy a small random base and kill several NPC enemies.
